overview: This is the dopest DVD to hit the streets this decade, it shows behind the scene footage of the infamous Roll Deep Crew, Renegade Boys and N.A.S.T.Y. in Amsterdam.  Watch the stars of the underground bun potent punks, spit hot bars & get serious reloads...It's merkage!  Watch how the UK Underground scene has spread like Grimey bacteria into another European country!
title: Amsterdam's Up In Smoke Concert
